abstract: A beautifully shot film by Academy Award winner Dean Semler capturing the atmosphere of a weekly ritual repeated in country towns across Australia.
description: Describes a day in the lives of Coral and John Whelan and family, who live at Lake Cargelligo, a small country town in outback New South Wales.
